item.title: 07 Mar 2017 00:00
item.description:
Tick tock, tick tick. Yike! A year back I didn’t even know what Lyme disease was. With about 15-20 hours in the woods every week, I guess it’s time for some long pants and shirts.

Source: Forbidding Forecast For Lyme Disease In The Northeast
item.content:encoded:
Tick tock, tick tick. Yike! A year back I didn’t even know what Lyme disease was. With about 15-20 hours in the woods every week, I guess it’s time for some long pants and shirts.

item.title: 07 Mar 2017 00:00
item.description: Not quite sure what this formation means. Spotted when I took a quick break to stretch out and ease out my shins. Frigid and blowing winds made the 10F feel much much colder. Sprinted over for some cover pretty quickly. #MiddlesexTales #Skyline
